info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
It's twilight time! Park visitors
seem to love this hour, taking photos together in the sunset glow,
like some kind of twilight ritual.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
When dusk falls,
I love to put on my favorite outfit,
and go on a Grand World Bubble Parade!
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
When I take part in these group photos,
my body emits a milky white glow.
Looking back, it's like the world's gentle gaze upon its visitors.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊
